description:
Ryuunosuke`s chest wrap goes missing while everyone`s in a fit of rugby mania! At the same time, an evil alien queen schemes to take over the planet!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Crash! Her Ladyship and the Football of Love
Gekitotsu!! Joou Heika to: Ai no Rugger Man
激突!!女王陛下と 愛のラガーマン
